content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 07 (APP):Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) has introduced career-making postgraduate diploma programs for aspiring fresh graduates. The programs include computer science, educational planning and management, educational leadership and management, early childhood education, entrepreneurship,A entrepreneurship in ECC,A supply chain management, human resource management, gender and women studies, population and development, international financial reporting standards and TEFL. The programs will lead to professional development of the aspiring students to achieve excels in the relevant fields. These are one-year of duration, consisting of two semesters.A BA/BSc.B.Com students are eligible to take admission. These will also help to organize and manage business venture in a competitive global marketplace that is constantly evolving. According to Director Admissions, aFebruary 17 is the last day for the enrollment in these programs.a Such programs are part of the Universityas recentA initiative to enhance capacity-building of the students, enabling them to earn their livelihood and to take part in the countryas socio-economic development. These are one-year diploma programs. Graduates will have excellent employment opportunities in both private and public sectors, domestically and internationally. Details of these programs, admission forms, and prospectuses are available on the universityas website: www.aiou.edu.pk. Information about these programs can also be obtained from the universityas regional offices located in 54 cities across the country. The addresses and contact numbers of these offices are also available on the universityas website. Students can call the university helpline 111-112-468 to inquire about admissions and details of programs ranging from matriculation to PhD levels.

summary.text: Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) has introduced career-making postgraduate diploma programs for aspiring fresh graduates. The programs are designed to enhance capacity-building of the students, enabling them to earn their livelihood and take part in the country's socio-economic development.

PERSON.name: Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) Director Admissions
